data.title: Derry PA funeral home and cremation Ligonier PA funeral home and cremation
data.meta_description: All Obituaries - McCabe Funeral Home offers a variety of funeral services, from traditional funerals to competitively priced cremations, serving Derry, PA, Ligonier, PA and the surrounding communities. We also offer funeral pre-planning and carry a wide selection of caskets, vaults, urns and burial containers.
data.meta_site_name: All Obituaries | McCabe Funeral Home | Derry PA funeral home and cremation Ligonier PA funeral home and cremation
data.text:
Barbara Lynn Barron Will Latrobe formerly of Ligonier

Barbara Lynn Barron Will, 69, of Latrobe, formerly of Ligonier, died Saturday June 22, 2024 in the Loyalhanna Care Center. She was born December 24, 1954 in Pittsburgh a daughter of the late Harry "Bob" and Patricia Anderson Barron. She was a member of Holy Trinity Roman Catholic Church of Ligonier and had worked as a home health nurse. She loved to read and was a Civil War History Buff. In addition to her parents she was preceded in death by her brother Steve Barron. Barb is...
